about_the_game:
Supreme Fighters is a free fighting game set in an urban environment. Fight against player or AI in multiple dynamic and destructible maps with 5 different and unique playable characters! Will you be the last player standing?

Gamemodes

Supreme Fighters currently features 3 different kinds of gamemodes.

- PvP (Teams or Free for All!) (4 Players / AI)

Fight in a free-for-all or team-based deathmatch until one player or team is the last one standing. Will you become the Supreme Fighter?

- PvE Survival (2 Players)

Team up together with another fighter to conquer and defeat all enemies across the city. Stand out and you might get noticed by Ghost...
Survival consists of multiple rounds of beating weaklings, with each round set in another map. At the end of each round you get to pick 1 out of 2 modifiers which can be either positive or negative for your survival. The difficulty will rise each time, but that won't be a problem, right?

- PvE Streets (4 Players)

Team up together with 3 fighters to protect a part of the city. You can work together or split up if you are confident enough!
This world consists of one big map where enemies will keep repeatedly spawning. There will be objects scattered around the map that can help you hold them off! Besides, who wouldn’t want to throw a traffic cone at their enemies? Capture hardpoints and get rewarded with positive modifiers! Try to survive and capture as much as possible to reach a new high score!

name: Supreme Fighters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

short_description: Supreme Fighters is a beat ‘em up combo style fighting game set in an urban fantasy environment. With enough playable characters you are guaranteed to find your own preferred fighting style and become The Supreme Fighter!
